title: LF Team
body: Hey my name is Rapiids and im a bronze 2 adc/jg player thats looking for a team. I'm down for serious teams and muck around games. Just willing to learn more about the game :) Thanks!

replies.body: hey man my ign is Abyssial and im captain of a team in a community, we have a mix of all ranks but i would like to make a team where the higher elos help the lower elos improve. a requirement is that you do have to sign up to a website and apply though heres the link: http://tenacitygaming.com/index.php/forums/forum/tenacity-gaming/ the team name is Tenacity Blue
I'm also looking for a team if you don't have much luck maybe we can practice and lift out of bronze
